vote.text: Amendment SA 5121 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5121 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR 9/29/2006 S10803; text: CR 9/29/2006 S10803) To amend the title.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5121 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Inhofe.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5121 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
